mapper.select: select tkmx.DQRQ from BASIC_CUSTOMER_INFORMATION b,TY_REPAY_TKMX tkmx ,TY_REPAY_LSZ lsz,TY_REPAY_YEHZ yehz,ty_customer_base c,TY_KDK_JH jh where b.ty_customer_id = c.id and c.KHNM = tkmx.khh and lsz.JJH=tkmx.JJH and yehz.JJH = tkmx.JJH

with mibusidata as ( SELECT * FROM ( select distinct tkmx.YWBH , b.id as id , b.KHH, b.KHMC, b.ZJHM, b.SJ, b.SXED, b.GHJL, tkmx.JKRQ as LOANDATE, tkmx.DQRQ, tkmx.DKQX, tkmx.JZLL, tkmx.FFJE as REQLMT, (case when(to_date(max(lsz.jzrq),'yyyy-mm-dd')-to_date(tkmx.dqrq,'yyyy-mm-dd')) > 0 then (to_date(max(lsz.jzrq),'yyyy-mm-dd')-to_date(tkmx.dqrq,'yyyy-mm-dd')) else null end ) as DELAYINTERESTDAYS, (case when(to_date(max(lsz.jzrq),'yyyy-mm-dd')-to_date(tkmx.dqrq,'yyyy-mm-dd')) > 0 then (to_date(max(lsz.jzrq),'yyyy-mm-dd')-to_date(tkmx.dqrq,'yyyy-mm-dd')) else null end )as DELAYAMTDAYS, max(lsz.jzrq) as DLAYDT, yehz.SHBJ, yehz.JKJE, yehz.KSQXRQ, yehz.SHLX as PAYDEBT, yehz.DKYE, yehz.BNQX, yehz.BWQX, yehz.DKYE as BALAMT , yehz.dkye as yxye, sysuser.id userid, sysuser.display_name from ty_repay_tkmx tkmx, ty_customer_base b, basic_customer_information basic, sys_user sysuser, ty_kdk_jh jh, ty_repay_yehz yehz, ty_repay_lsz lsz where basic.ty_customer_id=b.id and basic.user_id=sysuser.id and b.khnm=tkmx.khh and jh.ywbh=tkmx.ywbh||'HT' and yehz.jjh=tkmx.jjh and tkmx.jjh =lsz.jjh
and sysuser.id =#{userId}
group by tkmx.YWBH ,b.id ,b.KHH,b.KHMC, b.ZJHM, b.SJ, b.SXED, b.GHJL,tkmx.JKRQ , tkmx.DQRQ, tkmx.DKQX,tkmx.JZLL, tkmx.FFJE , yehz.SHBJ,yehz.JKJE, yehz.KSQXRQ,yehz.SHLX, yehz.DKYE,yehz.BNQX, yehz.BWQX,yehz.DKYE , yehz.dkye , sysuser.display_name, sysuser.id order by tkmx.jkrq ))
select ( select count(distinct(YWBH)) from mibusidata where 1=1 and LOANDATE <= to_char( to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd') and LOANDATE >= to_char( to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd')
and userid =#{userId} ) as increaseLoancount ,
( select count(distinct(a.YWBH)) from mibusidata a where 1=1 and a.LOANDATE <= to_char( to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd')
and a.userid =#{userId} ) as loanCustomerSum ,
(select count(distinct(a.YWBH)) from mibusidata a where 1=1 and a.LOANDATE <= to_char( to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd') and a.LOANDATE >= to_char( to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd')
and a.userid =#{userId} ) as increaseCusSum ,
(select count(distinct(a.YWBH)) from mibusidata a where 1=1 and a.LOANDATE <= to_char( to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd')
and a.userid =#{userId} ) as centreLoansSun ,
(select count(distinct a.YWBH) from mibusidata a where 1=1 and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and a.DLAYDT <= to_char(to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd')) and a.DLAYDT >= to_char(to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'))
and a.userid =#{userId} ) as increseOverdueCusTheMon ,
(select count(distinct a.YWBH) from mibusidata a where 1=1 and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and a.DLAYDT <= to_char(to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'))
and a.userid =#{userId} ) as alloverdue ,
(select sum(a.balamt)/(trunc(to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-MM-dd'))-trunc(to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-MM-dd'))) from mibusidata a where 1=1 and a.LOANDATE <= to_char( to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd') and a.LOANDATE >= to_char( to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd')
and a.userid =#{userId} ) as increaseBalanceTheMonth ,
(select sum(a.yxye) from mibusidata a where 1=1 and a.LOANDATE <= to_char( to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd') and a.LOANDATE >= to_char( to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd')
and a.userid =#{userId} ) as loanBalanceSum ,
(select sum(a.yxye) from mibusidata a where 1=1 and a.LOANDATE <= to_char( to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd')
and a.userid =#{userId} ) as contBalace ,
( select sum(a.yxye) from mibusidata a where 1=1 and a.LOANDATE <= to_char( to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd') and a.LOANDATE >= to_char( to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd')
and a.userid =#{userId} ) as increaseLoanCredit ,
( select sum(a.REQLMT) from mibusidata a where 1=1 and a.LOANDATE <= to_char( to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyymmdd')
and a.userid =#{userId} ) as contAmt , (select sum(nvl(a.DKYE,0) + nvl(a.BNQX,0) + nvl(a.BWQX,0)) from mibusidata a where 1=1 and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and a.DLAYDT <= to_char(to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd')) and a.DLAYDT >= to_char(to_date( #{startDate},'yyyy/mm/dd'))
and a.userid =#{userId} ) as overdueBalanceTheMon ,
(select sum(nvl(a.DKYE,0) + nvl(a.BNQX,0) + nvl(a.BWQX,0)) from mibusidata a where 1=1 and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and a.DLAYDT <= to_char(to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'))
and a.userid =#{userId} ) as overdueBalance ,
(select count(distinct a.YWBH) from mibusidata a where 1=1 and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) < 30 and nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) < 30 and a.DLAYDT <= to_char(to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd')) and a.DLAYDT >= to_char(to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'))
and a.userid =#{userId} ) as overdueCusM0 ,
( select count(distinct a.YWBH) from mibusidata a where 1=1 and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) >= 30 and nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) >= 30 and a.DLAYDT <= to_char(to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd')) and a.DLAYDT >= to_char(to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'))
and a.userid =#{userId} ) as overdueCusM1 ,
(select count(distinct a.YWBH) from mibusidata a where 1=1 and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) >= 60 and nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) >= 60 and a.DLAYDT <= to_char(to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd')) and a.DLAYDT >= to_char(to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'))
and a.userid =#{userId} ) as overdueCusM2 ,
( select count(distinct a.YWBH) from mibusidata a where 1=1 and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) >= 90 and nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) >= 90 and a.DLAYDT <= to_char(to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd')) and a.DLAYDT >= to_char(to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'))
and a.userid =#{userId} ) as overdueCusM3 ,
(select count(distinct a.YWBH) from mibusidata a where 1=1 and (nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) > 0 or nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) > 0) and nvl(a.DELAYINTERESTDAYS,0) >= 120 and nvl(a.DELAYAMTDAYS,0) >= 120 and a.DLAYDT <= to_char(to_date( #{endDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd')) and a.DLAYDT >= to_char(to_date( #{startDate} ,'yyyy/mm/dd'))
and a.userid =#{userId} ) as overdueCusM4 from dual
